channel.title: CVE Feed for Hitachi -- Hitachi Device Manager
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Hitachi -- Hitachi Device Manager

item.title: CVE-2023-49107|2024-01-16T00:59:46.297Z -- hitachi -- hitachi%20device%20manager
item.description: Generation of Error Message Containing Sensitive Information vulnerability in Hitachi Device Manager on Windows, Linux (Device Manager Agent modules).This issue affects Hitachi Device Manager: before 8.8.5-04.

item.title: CVE-2023-49106|2024-01-16T00:58:50.428Z -- hitachi -- hitachi%20device%20manager
item.description: Missing Password Field Masking vulnerability in Hitachi Device Manager on Windows, Linux (Device Manager Agent component).This issue affects Hitachi Device Manager: before 8.8.5-04.

item.title: CVE-2023-34143|2023-07-18T02:03:20.910Z -- hitachi -- hitachi%20device%20manager
item.description: Improper Validation of Certificate with Host Mismatch vulnerability in Hitachi Device Manager on Windows, Linux (Device Manager Server, Device Manager Agent, Host Data Collector components) allows Man in the Middle Attack.This issue affects Hitachi Device Manager: before 8.8.5-02.

item.title: CVE-2023-34142|2023-07-18T02:02:27.900Z -- hitachi -- hitachi%20device%20manager
item.description: Cleartext Transmission of Sensitive Information vulnerability in Hitachi Device Manager on Windows, Linux (Device Manager Server, Device Manager Agent, Host Data Collector components) allows Interception.This issue affects Hitachi Device Manager: before 8.8.5-02.
